name: Saint Thomas Charitable And Educational Trust (Stcet)
briefDescription: St. Thomas Charitable And Educatioal Trust Is A Voluntary Organization Established In The Year 1996 In Perundurai, Erode District And Registered Under The Tamilnadu Societies Registration Act 1975 With The Registrar Of Societies, Erode.The Trust Has Established Annai Industrial Training Centre At Perundurai During 1997 And Offering Vocational Training In Various Disciplines Approved By Director Of Employment And Training, Govt. Of Tamil Nadu And Director General Of Employment And Training, New Delhi. orgnisation also Offered In Curtain Disciplines With The Approval Of The Director Employment And Training, Chennai. (State Pattern) This Year We Got Approved From Dget, Mes, Diplomo Cources In Tamil Nadu Open University. SJSRY SKILL TRAINING IN All over tamil Nadu approved by Commissioner Municipal Administration, Chennai(CMA) period in 2012-15. Aajeevika Vocational skill training approved by  Mahalir thittam, Chennai. (TWDCL)
